MousekinBookUtility.rulePack.rulesString.li: macguffin->a legendary elixir to save a Mousekin town from a plague epidemic
macguffin->a legendary grove of the most delicious Chonko nuts
macguffin->a magical bed that would cure all diseases and injuries of any person that lies upon it, to save a sickly friend
macguffin->a magical cupboard containing endless food and drink, to save an impoverished Mousekin village from famine
macguffin->a secret treasure cache hidden decades before by the notorious bandit [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner]
macguffin->the greatsword of the legendary Mousekin knight Sir [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Heroic]
bookDescNonFiction->Aproveitando os anos de experiência prática de [authorFullname], este [bookType] estabelece o autor como uma autoridade líder em [subject] em todo o Reino Mousekin.
romanceSubplotInterclass->and how their defiance of social expectations ultimately brings happiness to everyone around them
romanceSubplotInterclass->as they contend with the various challenges that come with their different stations in society
romanceSubplotFirstMeeting->he returns a dropped purse to her
romanceSubplotFirstMeeting->he saves her from boorish drunks outside of a tavern
romanceSubplotFirstMeeting->she offers him shelter from a storm one night
bookQualityFicBadFirstHalf->The narrative is frequently interrupted by too many flashbacks
bookQualityFicBadFirstHalf->The plot is riddled with continuity errors
bookQualityFicBadFirstHalf->The story is hindered by multiple unrelated subplots
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and all the supporting characters lack depth beyond their immediate narrative purpose
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and is plagued by wooden dialogue
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and spends too long on side chapters involving a supporting character that is obviously based on the author's real-life lover and muse
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and the author's use of archaic, flowery language confuses all but the most scholarly of readers
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and the climax contains a 90-page monologue by the protagonist that preaches the author's personal view on morality
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and the plot twist at the climax lacked the necessary build-up
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and the protagonist demonstrates no character growth
bookQualityFicBadSecondHalf->and the unexpected appearance of Valerian the Wise himself to resolve the plot makes the ending feel unearned
bookQualityFicNormalFirstHalf->The story develops its premise reasonably well
bookQualityFicNormalFirstHalf->The story is gripping at times
bookQualityFicNormalFirstHalf->The narrative offers a fresh take on the genre
bookQualityFicNormalSecondHalf(quality[greater_than]2)->and has quite a few humorous moments
bookQualityFicNormalSecondHalf(quality[greater_than]2)->and the final plot twist is well-executed
bookQualityFicNormalSecondHalf(quality[less_than]3)->but has a major plot hole that results in a rather contrived conclusion
bookQualityFicNormalSecondHalf(quality[less_than]3)->but has a rather distracting flashback in the middle of a pivotal scene
bookQualityFicNormalSecondHalf(quality[less_than]3)->but the author often uses inappropriate words in an attempt to impress the reader
bookQualityFicGoodFirstHalf->The story is a heart-pounding tale of excitement
bookQualityFicGoodFirstHalf->The story is tightly written with rich emotion
bookQualityFicGoodSecondHalf->and many characters demonstrate hidden depths
bookQualityFicGoodSecondHalf->and one highly memorable piece of dialogue became popular enough to enter lexicon
bookQualityFicGoodSecondHalf->and the author's clever subversion of tropes common to the genre reveals the rich complexity of Mousekin nature
bookQualityFicGoodSecondHalf->and the characters are highly relatable due to their complex motivations
bookQualityFicGoodSecondHalf->and the witty dialogue is highly memorable
bookQualityNonFicBad->Quase todas as páginas estão prestes a se soltar da lombada.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Larvas infestaram as capas de couro e a lombada.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Quase todas as páginas foram descoloridas pela fumaça de um incêndio, tornando o conteúdo quase ilegível.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Abrir a capa libera um odor rançoso de urina, sugerindo que o proprietário anterior usava este exemplar como apoio para um penico.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Várias páginas têm manchas de uma caneca de café de Chonko.
bookQualityNonFicBad->O conteúdo e as páginas introdutórias foram completamente obscurecidos por tinta preta derramada, que penetrou por várias camadas de papel.
bookQualityNonFicBad->As folhas de guarda da frente e de trás estão quase totalmente cobertas pelas tentativas amadoras do proprietário anterior de praticar sua assinatura.
bookQualityNonFicBad->As páginas de um capítulo inteiro foram arrancadas, deixando tocos de papel irregulares.
bookQualityNonFicBad->O proprietário anterior sublinhou cada outra palavra em todas as páginas com diferentes cores de tinta.

bookQualityNonFicBad->O canto superior esquerdo de várias dezenas de páginas contém rabiscos sequenciais grosseiros, mostrando um fazendeiro Mousekin repetidamente golpeando um pistoreiro Grimalkin com uma enxada de jardim.
bookQualityNonFicNormal->Algumas páginas deste exemplar estão dobradas nos cantos.
bookQualityNonFicNormal->Uma flor prensada foi deixada entre as páginas do meio.
bookQualityNonFicNormal->O dourado da capa perdeu o brilho com a idade, mas o livro está em boas condições.

bookQualityNonFicNormal->A lombada deste exemplar está quebrada em vários pontos, e as bordas de vários capítulos estão levemente gastas, sugerindo que o proprietário anterior considerava este livro particularmente útil.
bookQualityNonFicGood->O livro carrega o selo de uma respeitada editora na cidade capital de Arcádia.
bookQualityNonFicGood->Todas as ilustrações do livro foram ricamente desenhadas com tinta colorida, e em alguns casos adornadas com folha de ouro.

bookQualityNonFicGood->A capa, lombada e páginas estão praticamente intactas, quase como se o proprietário anterior tivesse tratado o livro com grande reverência – ou simplesmente nunca tivesse lido seu conteúdo.
bookQualityNonFicGood->A capa apresenta um trabalho artesanal intrincado, com detalhes finos em dourado ilustrando o tema do livro.

Description_Mousekin_BookNovelAdventure..li: desc->In this sequel to [authorFullname]'s [bookTypeFic] "[title]", [protagonistNameOnly] embarks on a new [journey] [task][optionalSecondaryPlot].\n\n[bookQualityFic]
task->to clear the name of a friend wrongly accused of murder
task->to destroy a cursed tome before the Cult of the Pink Rat uses it to summon an army of half-rodent, half-smoothskin abominations
task->to rescue a princess kidnapped by bandits
task->to rescue the kidnapped heir of [noblePerson]
task->to slay a giant worm terrorizing several Mousekin villages
task->to slay a mythical Beast of Iron threatening the Mousekin Kingdom
task->to stop the Mousekin Kingdom from starting a war on false pretenses
optionalSecondaryPlot->, accompanied by a faithful giant cavy named [Mousekin_AnimalName_GiantCavy]
optionalSecondaryPlot->, accompanied by a faithful pudgemouse named [Mousekin_AnimalName_Pudgemouse]
optionalSecondaryPlot->, encountering a dastardly group of Mousekin brigands along the way
optionalSecondaryPlot->, helping outlying Mousekin villages along the way
optionalSecondaryPlot->, joined by a foppish nobleman's son seeking to impress his lady love
optionalSecondaryPlot->, joined by a rebellious princess with an adventurous streak
optionalSecondaryPlot->, while evading pursuit by an overzealous magistrate and his posse
optionalSecondaryPlot->, while helping a lost smoothskin child find his way back home

desc->In this comedy by [authorFullname], [plotB]\n\n[bookQualityFic]

plotA->best friends [Mousekin_FirstName_Female] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner] and [Mousekin_FirstName_Female] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner], who have been corresponding with their respective secret lovers through messages passed on by a [commonerJobMale] named [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner]. Chaotic hilarity ensues when [comedyLoveMessengerSubplot].
plotA->[nobleFemale] and [nobleFemale], who take a fancy to each other's [comedyNoblesSwappingItemFemale] and decide to swap them for a day, with hilarious results.
plotA->[nobleMale] and [nobleMale], who take a fancy to each other's [comedyNoblesSwappingItemMale] and decide to swap them for a day, with hilarious results.

plotA->three friends - the [commonerJobMale] [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner], the [commonerJobMale] [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner], and the [commonerJobMale] [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner] - who decide to [comedyTrioVenture] despite their lack of experience or preparation, with amusing consequences.

plotB(p=0.2)->a down-on-his-luck [commonerJobMale] named [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner] runs out of beer money at a tavern, and impulsively opens a tab under the name of [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner], unaware that the latter is [comedyTavernBarTabCharacter]. Hilarity ensues when old lovers, debt collectors, and long-lost relatives all come calling.
plotB->[nobleMale]'s bored [childrenOrdinalAdj] daughter Lady [Mousekin_FirstName_Female] decides to go incognito and experience life [comedyLadyIncognitoLocation] - with amusing consequences.

plotB(p=2)->a [commonerJobMale] named [Mousekin_FirstName_Male] [Mousekin_LastName_Commoner] is hired to impersonate [nobleMale] for a day while the latter [comedyIdenticalStrangerExcuse], but is forced to keep up the masquerade after [comedyIdenticalStrangerComplication], with hysterical results.
plotB(p=2)->the author explores the lighthearted side of the power dynamics between different classes in Mousekin society when [comedyClassPowerDynamicsSubplot].

Description_Mousekin_BookResearch.rulePa.li: bookDescNonFiction->[authorFullname] [subject_primary_story]. Este [bookType] é a compilação do autor de várias notas, regras práticas e estudos de caso sobre [subject_primary_gerund].

bookDescNonFiction->Este [bookType] de [authorFullname] é amplamente considerado um excelente texto introdutório sobre [subject], cobrindo teorias fundamentais, história, técnicas comuns e aplicações práticas.

bookDescNonFiction->Este [bookType] de [authorFullname] é principalmente uma coleção de esboços detalhados e notas sobre exemplos práticos de [subject], com ocasionais anedotas espirituosas, porém pertinentes.

Description_Mousekin_BookSkills.rulePack.li: bookDescNonFiction->[authorFullname]'s [bookType] on [subject] is a condensed version of study materials originally commissioned by a [nobleRank] in the Mousekin Kingdom for the family's eldest sons, simplified for public consumption.
detail(p=4)->, and is required reading as part of the syllabus at the Royal University of Arcadia.
detail(p=4)->, despite the author's frequent digressions into personal commentary.
detail(p=4)->, with each core concept explained succinctly and accompanied by real-world examples.
detail(p=4)->, compiled with knowledge gleaned from the author's leading contemporaries in the subject.
detail->, although some readers may be confused by the author's unorthodox use of an extensive framing narrative to teach the subject.
